constant.name: MI_REPORTING_DATA_EXPORT_CASE_EMPL_STATUS_SQL
constant.description: Holds the SQL for the Case Employment Status for the Data Export

typedValue.value: SELECT CE.CaseID AS 'Case ID', CE.EmploymentStatus AS 'Employment Status', CE.Employer AS 'Employer', CE.Industry AS 'Industry', CE.WorkType AS 'Work Type', CE.WorkHours AS 'Work Hours', CE.JobTitle AS 'Job Title', CE.JobDescription AS 'Description', CE.EmployerRelationship AS 'Employer Relationship', CE.EmployerExpectations AS 'Emp Expectations', CE.RelationshipColleagues AS 'Relationship Colleagues', CE.ClientExpectations AS 'Client Expectations', CE.CreatedBy AS 'Created By', CE.CreatedDate AS 'Created Date', CE.financialsituation AS 'Financial Situation', CE.IsActive AS 'Is Active' FROM appiansecondary.caseemploymentstatus CE
